sentences.en: A poplar pierced up into the dark - blue sky and touched a white star there.
sentences.cn: 一棵白杨树刺破暗兰色的天空,碰到一颗白星.

sentences.en: A tall poplar tree once stood here.
sentences.cn: 这儿曾经有过一棵高大的白杨树.

sentences.en: A tall poplar tree once stood there.
sentences.cn: 该处曾有一棵高大的白杨树.

sentences.en: After a while, we found a shady place under some poplar trees.
sentences.cn: 过一会儿, 我们在几棵白杨树下找到一块荫凉地.

sentences.en: Brought up in town, the boy finds it difficult to separate a poplar from a willow.
sentences.cn: 那男孩是在城里长大的, 所以觉得很难区别杨树和柳树.

sentences.en: Daylight was dying, the moon rising, gold behind the poplar!
sentences.cn: 天色快黑了, 月亮正在升起, 白杨树后面透出一片淡黄!

sentences.en: INTRODUCTION: The elegant girl stands there quietly like a small white poplar.
sentences.cn: 作品简介: 女孩静静地站在那儿,就象一棵小小的白杨轻盈飘逸.

sentences.en: Poplar lumber is raw material of high grade pulp papermaking.
sentences.cn: 杨树木材是优质的木浆造纸原料.

sentences.en: The island, the smallest of the Canadian provinces, is home to a variety of showy fall species: maple, oak, birch, quaking aspen and poplar, each contributing its own hue to the polychrome landscape.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿是加拿大最小的省份，有着各式各样艳丽的树种：枫树、橡树、桦树、颤杨和白杨，它们各自为那里的多姿多彩风景提供了自己所独有的色调。

sentences.en: The leaves of the poplar trees rustled in the wind.
sentences.cn: 风吹着白杨树叶沙沙地响.

sentences.en: The white poplar is no ordinary tree . Let me sing its praises.
sentences.cn: 白杨树实在是不平凡的, 我赞美白杨树!

sentences.en: Thecolor of sapwood of Chinese white poplar among trees has significant difference.
sentences.cn: 毛白杨边材材色株间存在显著差异.

sentences.en: There are abundance wilding plant resources including cypress, poplar, spruce etc.
sentences.cn: 山中野生植物资源丰富,盛产云杉、柏 、 杨等木材.

sentences.en: There are abundant wilding plant resources including cypress, poplar and spruce.
sentences.cn: 山中野生植物资源丰富,盛产柏 、 白杨、云杉等木材.

sentences.en: There's a bench under a poplar tree.
White poplar , the creature far from banality merits all my eulogy.
sentences.cn: 白杨树实在是不平凡的, 我赞美白杨树.

trans.tran_en: a very tall straight thin tree that grows very fast
